album.title: More Life (A Playlist By October Firm)

wiki.summary: On “Sacrifices,” Drizzy teams up with Atlanta rappers 2 Chainz and Young Thug to detail the various sacrifices they have made over their lives, as well as the struggles they overcame on the way to the top of the rap game. “Sacrifices” includes a running motif of the number “21”: Drake starts his verse with “Wrote this shit January 21” and mentions Kendall Jenner turning 21, along with rapper 21 Savage. He also happens to rap that line 21 seconds into the song. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: On “Sacrifices,” Drizzy teams up with Atlanta rappers 2 Chainz and Young Thug to detail the various sacrifices they have made over their lives, as well as the struggles they overcame on the way to the top of the rap game. “Sacrifices” includes a running motif of the number “21”: Drake starts his verse with “Wrote this shit January 21” and mentions Kendall Jenner turning 21, along with rapper 21 Savage. He also happens to rap that line 21 seconds into the song. 2 Chainz starts his verse with: “2 Chainz, I'ma real one.” Young Thug starts his verse with “I was stealin' from a bitch (slime)/Back when I was 21 (facts)” and follows it up with: “My favorite gun was a SIG (nine)/20 in the clip, head one (no cockin').” The song also happens to be the 12th track from ‘More Life.’ Read more on Last.fm.
